{"id":553361716,"lang":"cpp","time":"6Â months","timestamp":1631408885,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"26 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/553361716/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Longest Substring Without Repeating Characters","memory":"8.3 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    int lengthOfLongestSubstring(string s) {\n        if(s.empty()) return 0;\n        int mx=1,b=0,i;\n        unordered_map<char,int>mp;\n        for(i=0;i<s.length();i++){\n            if(mp.count(s[i])){\n                mx=max(mx,i-b);\n                b=max(b,mp[s[i]]+1);\n                mp[s[i]]=i;\n            }\n            else mp[s[i]]=i;            \n        }\n        return max(mx,i-b);\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"longest-substring-without-repeating-characters"}
